Articles.Content: Well, say we take all the fan art, and make it into a big slideshow!

People have been recommending this since I asked for the artwork to be put there in the first place. I\'m sure it wouldn\'t take long but Harvester was always so busy with other stuff.

Maybe now that the team has grown a lot it could be done though. It would be really great to get a nice collection of the best quality work up there; even better if it regularly updated from new work and displayed them in a random order.
